Item.Value: [Text:You $Name$? I heard that you were starting a town out here and figured you could use a hand. My name's $Character_6$, a $Class_5$ looking for work. I'd appreciate it if you could set up a house for me. Maybe something that looks like this.][UnlockBuildingID:12][Name:Introduction]
[Text:$Name$, hello. Having a good day I trust? Stay safe, and don't make me follow you around.][Default][Name:1]

[Text:$Name$? You look stressed. Please don't push yourself and make sure you're getting enough sleep. a few years back I tried six hours a night and let me tell you what a mistake that was.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Oh, thank you. I really appreciate this.][Name:Gift]
[Text:Is that really for me? $Name$! Thank you. This really means a lot to me.][Name:Collection]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.][Name:JoinPartyYes]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
[Text:You're running around in this rain? Ha, of course you are. There's no stopping you, is there? It's admirable, if concerning.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
